mapper.select:
select p.prdt_no, p.prdt_name, p.mno, m.mid, p.qty, p.price, p.discount , p.price - (p.price / 100 * p.discount) sale_price , p.description, p.view_cnt, p.reg_date , p.thumbnail_name, p.thumbnail_path, p.prdt_img_name, p.prdt_img_path , p.desc_img_name, p.desc_img_path, p.add_file_name, p.add_file_path from product2 p, member2 m where del_yn = 0
and p.prdt_name like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and m.mid like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and p.mno = m.mno order by prdt_no desc limit #{limitNum}, 10

select count(p.prdt_no) cnt from product p, member m where del_yn = 0
and p.prdt_name like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and m.mid like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and p.mno = m.mno
mapper.update: update tip set title=#{title}, writer=#{writer}, ctnts=#{ctnts} where tip_no =#{tip_no}
mapper.insert: insert into tip (tip_no, tip_title, tip_ctnts, tip_date, tip_prdt_pic, tip_prdt_path ) values (0, #{tip_title}, #{tip_ctnts}, now(), #{tip_prdt_pic}, #{tip_prdt_path})
